doc.after: The reliability of Wikipedia primarily of the English language edition compared to other encyclopedias and more specialized sources has been assessed in many ways including statistically through comparative review analysis of the historical patterns and strengths and weaknesses inherent in the editing process unique to Wikipedia 1
